settings.title: AI Meta Generator
settings.apiKeyRequired: Please enter an API key first

seoForm.generateMetadataHelpText: Automatically generates SEO metadata (title, description, keywords) using AI. Product name and description must be filled in first.
seoForm.errorMissingRequiredFields: Product name and description are required for metadata generation
seoForm.errorApiKeyNotConfigured: OpenAI API key is not configured. Please configure it in the plugin settings.
